00047 template <class T>
00048 SimpleBinaryTree<T>::SimpleBinaryTree(const SimpleBinaryTree<T> & otherTree)
00049 {
00050         if (otherTree.root == 0)
00051                 root = 0;
00052         else
00053                 copyTree(root, otherTree.root);
00054 }

00061 
00063 template <class T>
00064 const SimpleBinaryTree<T> & SimpleBinaryTree<T>::operator=(const SimpleBinaryTree<T> & otherTree)
00065 {
00066         // Avoid self-assignment
00067         if (this != &otherTree)
00068         {
00069                 if (root != 0)
00070                         destroy(root);
00071 
00072                 if (otherTree.root == 0)
00073                         root = 0;
00074                 else
00075                         copyTree(root, otherTree.root);
00076         }
00077         return *this; // The value of the object that was just assigned.
00078 }

00153 template <class T>
00154 int SimpleBinaryTree<T>::height(nodeType<T> * p) const
00155 {
00156         if (p == 0)
00157                 return 0;
00158         else
00159                 return 1 + max(height(p->left), height(p->right));
00160 }
00161

00166 
00170 template <class T>
00171 int SimpleBinaryTree<T>::max(const int & x, const int & y) const
00172 {
00173         if (x >= y)
00174         {
00175                 return x;
00176         }
00177         else
00178         {
00179                 return y;
00180         }
00181 }

00189 template <class T>
00190 int SimpleBinaryTree<T>::nodeCount(nodeType<T> * p) const
00191 {
00192         if (p != 0)
00193         {
00194                 return(
00195                                           1
00196                                         + nodeCount(p->left)
00197                                         + nodeCount(p->right)
00198                            );
00199         }
00200         return 0;
00201 }
00202

00205 
00209 template <class T>
00210 int SimpleBinaryTree<T>::leavesCount(nodeType<T> *p) const
00211 {
00212         if (p == 0)
00213         {
00214                 // This is a leaf node
00215                 return 1;
00216         }
00217 
00218         // This is NOT a leaf node.
00219         return(
00220                                 leavesCount(p->left)
00221                           + leavesCount(p->right)
00222                    );
00223 }

00234 template <class T>
00235 void SimpleBinaryTree<T>::copyTree(
00236                                                                 nodeType<T> * & copiedTreeRoot,
00237                                                                 nodeType<T> * otherTreeRoot
00238                                                         )
00239 {
00240         if (otherTreeRoot == 0)
00241                 copiedTreeRoot = 0;
00242         else
00243         {
00244                 copiedTreeRoot = new nodeType<T>;
00245                 copiedTreeRoot->data = otherTreeRoot->data;
00246                 copyTree(copiedTreeRoot->left, otherTreeRoot->left);
00247                 copyTree(copiedTreeRoot->right, otherTreeRoot->right);
00248         }
00249 }

00264 template <class T>
00265 void SimpleBinaryTree<T>::destroy(nodeType<T> * & p)
00266 {
00267         if (p != 0)
00268         {
00269                 destroy(p->left);
00270                 destroy(p->right);
00271                 delete p;
00272                 p = 0;
00273         }
00274 }

00280 template <class T>
00281 void SimpleBinaryTree<T>::destroyTree()
00282 {
00283         destroy(root);
00284 }

00319 template <class T>
00320 void SimpleBinaryTree<T>::inOrder(nodeType<T> * p) const
00321 {
00322         if (p != 0)
00323         {
00324                 inOrder(p->left);
00325                 cout << p->data << " ";  // process me in the middle.
00326                 inOrder(p->right);
00327         }
00328 }
00329 
00330 
00331 
00333 template <class T>
00334 void SimpleBinaryTree<T>::preOrder(nodeType<T> * p) const
00335 {
00336         if (p != NULL)
00337         {
00338                 cout << p->data << " ";  // process me first
00339                 preOrder(p->left);
00340                 preOrder(p->right);
00341         }
00342 }
00343 
00344 
00345 
00347 template <class T>
00348 void SimpleBinaryTree<T>::postOrder(nodeType<T> * p) const
00349 {
00350         if (p != NULL)
00351         {
00352                 postOrder(p->left);
00353                 postOrder(p->right);
00354                 cout << p->data << " "; // process me last
00355         }
00356 }
